name: sap.watt.common.service.platform.DocumentProvider
description: The interface for document provider. A document provider

getDocumentByKeyString.description: Get a document by it's key string

createDocumentInternally.description: Creates a Document instance based on the entity. Be careful it will not create it in the backend. To create a document in the backend, get a document an create a child of it (e.g. folder.createFile()).

params.name: oEntity
params.description: The entity with the basic information to create a document for

params.name: oEventEmitter
params.description: Event Emitter context of the document service

returns.description: The newly created document instance with the specific methods of the type adapter

deprecated.description: ExtDocuments are deprecated, File Systems now allows multiple DAO objects e.g. to fetch documents from JAM which has to replace this

createExtDocumentInternally.description: Creates a Document instance based on the ExtDocument. Be careful it will not create it in the backend.

params.name: oExtDocument
params.description: The object with the basic information to create a document for

params.name: oEventEmitter
params.description: Event Emitter context of the document service

returns.description: The newly created document instance with the specific methods of the type adapter

createProject.description: Creates a project instance based on the entity. unlike createDocumentInternally this method creates the document in the BE
